name: Cosmic Nomad
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #29

You have had enough of the solar system and now you fly as a Nomad from planetary system to planetary system. Collect water, fuel and food in your little rocket to travel to the next system. Use your fuel wisely, fight epic battles and pass tricky levels.

Features
  • Realistic gravitational forces and rocket physics
  • 9 unique planetary systems to explore
  • Weapons and enemies
  • Several rocket models
Note: Due to strange performance problems, I recommend not playing the game in fullscreen mode for now. (At least not on Mac OS or Retina Displays.)

This is my first Godot game and my second ever. So I am very happy about any feedback.
